Port Nyanzaru.description: A bustling port city and the primary entry point to Chult.

Jungle.description: Dense jungle with dangerous creatures and treacherous terrain.

River.description: A winding river surrounded by dense jungle.

Lake.description: A serene lake offering occasional respite for travelers.

Swamp.description: A murky and treacherous swamp filled with unseen dangers.

Coast.description: A rugged coastline with the remains of old shipwrecks.

Mountain.description: Towering peaks challenging even the most seasoned explorers.

Wasteland.description: A barren wasteland where survival is the ultimate challenge.

Omu.description: A ruined city with hidden dangers and treasures.
